name: Stuck Balls
description:
Stick your way to the flag to win

Controls:

One ball has to be stuck to a surface for the other one to move freely

E(LB) -> left ball stick

WASD(Left Stick) -> left ball move

U(RB) -> right ball stick

IJKL(Right Stick) -> right ball move

There is a level in game that has broken sprites, which will show up as all black. Here is that level, find your way with this image, hopefully...

source: https://github.com/seyahdoo/gmtk-jam-2021-stuck-balls
